author: Special Correspondent
text:
Three school students were swept away in the sea at Poompuhar in the district on Friday.

The body of one of them was washed ashore later while the fate of the other two is not yet known.

Police sources said a group of students from Mayiladuthurai went to Poompuhar on Friday to take bath in the sea when the incident happened.

Three of them — R. Jeevasakthi (17), S. Rajasudhakar (17) and R. Arjun (17) — were swept away by the waves.

Jeevasakthi’s body was washed ashore later, while the fate of the remaining two is not known, police sources said.
title: 3 students swept away in sea at Poompuhar
